taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus eubatus;section tholiformes;species arundelanus;variety jeckylanus;

treatment.other_name: (for stevenson's dr. jekyll, because of its variable character)
treatment.description: Branches and branchlets less pendulous; terminal leaflet of primocane-foliage cordate, its petiolule 1-2.5 cm. long, scarcely plicate; pedicels more glandular.
treatment.discussion: With the species and passing into it,
